name: Phinney Bischoff
tagline: We take brands to new and better places.
description:
Phinney Bischoff specializes in integrated brand design, including research and strategy, design, interactive, and ideation with a special emphasis on a transparent and inclusive approach to client collaborations.
Our design expertise encompasses a wide-range of services including websites and multimedia, ideation, corporate identities, marketing collateral, brochures, packaging and annual reports.
